document_data.name: Bathmé
document_data.mainbody: '''Bathmé''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Bathmé was located in the [[Halar Hills]] of west Halruaa. The town was situated long the north bank of the [[River Halar]] north of [[Akhlaur Swamp]].
